attributes.action: allow a petition on this web site regarding holding a referendum concerning The European Union Reform Treaty agreed in Brussels on 23rd June 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petitions have been rejected to insure the British public have no democratic way to have a say in their future. 

In view of the significance of this treaty, its ratification should be the subject of a petition which the British general public should be free to vote on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
